name: Escape the Mazes
description: Escape the Mazes is a puzzle game where the player need to find the exit of differents mazes! Do you think you can find your way to escape the mazes?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Processor: 1 GHZ Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 20 MB available space
